displayName.text: Crestwood Funeral Home and Cremation Services

formattedAddress: 445 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Crestwood Funeral Home and Cremation Services

adrFormatAddress: 445 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036-5314, USA

originalText.text:
One of the most difficult decisions I’ve had to make in my life, was to choose a funeral home in a distant city for a loved one who passed away unexpectedly. Using only location and reviews, I chose Crestwood on West 43rd Street in Manhattan. From the first phone call with Keila and subsequent communication with John and Joel, I knew I had made the right decision. The entire staff made the whole process so much less stressful. The arrangements were handled very professionally and within our budget.
Steve Jennings

originalText.text: My mom passed away a month ago! It was a very sad time for me ,my sister and family! Crestwood funeral home was so compassionate from Kayla to John Morreale who did an excellent job helping us with all our concerns and guiding us through a most difficult time! We thank them for their kindness! God Bless them!!

text.text: My mom passed away a month ago! It was a very sad time for me ,my sister and family! Crestwood funeral home was so compassionate from Kayla to John Morreale who did an excellent job helping us with all our concerns and guiding us through a most difficult time! We thank them for their kindness! God Bless them!!

originalText.text: I have to say that my family had a recent loss 3/9/2022 and from beginning to end Crestwood Funeral Home went above and beyond expectations.  I unfortunately could not attend but the response I received from my family members made me feel at ease.  The staff was amazing and thoughtful till the very end.  I have dealt with them before and always have had a pleasant experience.  When you are grieving and dealing with sorrow it’s nice to know that someone cares enough to assist you in making arrangements and preparations that most don’t expect.  I am grateful to the owner and staff for treating my family as if their own.  I could not be there but I am overwhelmed with the response I received from my family members on how smoothly and helpful Crestwood Funeral was.  I would definitely recommend their funeral services.  Thank you Crestwood and staff for your professionalism and support.

originalText.text: I want to take a moment to write a review for the appreciation I have for the services rendered by Crestwood Funeral Home.  I recently lost my dad and they were so genuine in the treatment my family received.  Just today I again was there due to the loss of my aunt and once again John and the staff came through.  They are an amazing staff in giving you the attention you need in your time of grief.  Thank you for the wonderful services you render you are definitely an asset to our community. Thank you once again.

originalText.text:
I chose Crestwood at random - I had my husband on home hospice and the social worker asked me if I had selected a Funeral Director. I had not so she provided a few names and Crestwood was on the list. When my husband passed I told the nurse to call Crestwood as it was close but if only I had realized how fortunate I was to choose them.
John and his magnificent team helped me every step of the way. I am a British person and  although I have been living in NYC for more than  20 years I never though either my husband or I  would die here so I had never thoughy to check out Funeral Homes.
Crestwood was amazing, advising on absolutely everything - nothing was too much trouble and they were so respectful and dignified in every aspect of our communications. I cannot praise them highly enough.
If I could give more than five stars I would - you made a horrible , tragic  and terrifying experience at least something I could get through. Now its just a matter of day by day  and time but then I honestly don't think I could have got through it without your support.
Thank you so much  to John , Reina  and the team.
Best
Carol
